class.name: CovarianceTest

javadoc.text: Test Longley dataset against R. * Data Source: J. Longley (1967) "An Appraisal of Least Squares * Programs for the Electronic Computer from the Point of View of the User" * Journal of the American Statistical Association, vol. 62. September, * pp. 819-841. * Data are from NIST: * http://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/strd/lls/data/LINKS/DATA/Longley.dat
Test R Swiss fertility dataset against R. * Data Source: R datasets package
Verify that diagonal entries are consistent with Variance computation and matrix matches * column-by-column covariances

method.name: testConsistency
method.comment: All columns same -> all entries = column variance
